item.description:
Michelle has joined us and is organizing singles hikes for the 20's and 30's crowd! Come support this new series of events and have loads of hiking and fun!

The group will hike the route around Breakneck Pond. Bring a lunch, bug spray, and a bathing suit if you want to swim in the lake.

Bigelow Hollow State Park and the adjoining Nipmuck State Forest offer over 9,000 acres of recreation opportunities including miles of hiking trails and an 18-acre pond in Eastern Connecticut.

Meet at 9 AM at the I-84 exit 68 "park and ride" lot before entering the park. You can also condense cars at that time to minimize the entrance fee. There is a $7 CT resident/$10 non-resident per car entrance fee to the park. Carpooling is encouraged.

Any questions, please contact the leader Michelle (http://hiking.meetup....) first or Kevin S (http://hiking.meetup....) if need be.

Do NOT make any payment via Paypal! Pay your share at the meetup.

BTW, Michelle Organizes the new "Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group" (http://diningout.meet....

For more information, see http://dep.state.ct.u...

item.name: Michelle's 20's & 30's Singles Hike to Bigelow Hollow State Park, Union CT
